backend/main.mo: Motoko canister that stores timestamped float readings, supports adding and querying readings, and exposes a simple hello endpoint.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence document mapping feature requests to impacted files, components, and test IDs for runtime config loader updates and frontend redeploy.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files including components, hooks, utilities, styling, and config loader behavior.
frontend/DEPLOY_FRONTEND_ONLY.md: Guide outlining the clean rebuild and redeploy steps needed to ship updated frontend bundles using the latest runtime configuration loader.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color tokens, light/dark mode variables, and base visual theme settings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint with deploy marker and optional hook for injecting CANISTER_ID_BACKEND at runtime.
frontend/public/env.json: Static environment file providing blank CANISTER_ID_BACKEND and backend_canister_id fields for runtime resolution.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app rendering authentication controls, logging instructions, latest reading card, and readings table with manual and automatic refresh.
frontend/src/components/HttpLoggingInstr: Component that resolves backend canister ID at runtime and displays HTTP logging URLs with loading, error, and copy-to-clipboard states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that initializes an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for polling all readings and the latest reading from the backend actor at 3‑second intervals.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines a large set of theme color variables for light and dark modes using OKLCH values.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting numbers and converting bigint nanosecond timestamps into human‑readable date/time strings.
frontend/src/lib/runtimeConfig.ts: Resolves the backend canister ID through multiple fallbacks (env vars, window, session cache, env.json) with caching and graceful failure handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that mounts the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, colors, container settings, border radii, shadows, and animations using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Describes the project's state, issues, and required features, focusing on fixing env.json backend canister ID resolution and redeploying the frontend.
